90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Paul,
You are so welcome. Please let me know if you have any questions for me.
Thanks! Sara
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners

From: Paul Trompeter [mailto:ptrompeter@socal.rr.com] Sent: Wednesday, February 08, 2012 4:12 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: MBO Call Follow UP
Thanks and it was a pleasure speaking with you.
Regards,
Paul 805-405-7530 Cell "Sail, don't drift."
From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] Sent: Wednesday, February 08, 2012 1:52 PM To: ptrompeter@socal.rr.com Subject: MBO Call Follow UP
Dear Paul ,
It was a pleasure speaking with you. You’ll find everything that I referenced on our call by going here.
We are also promoting our new meet the independents project and are taking applications if you would like to be featured. You can view the program by going here.
I will follow up with you as promised, should you have questions before then, please schedule a convenient time using my online schedule.
Best regards, Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
